passages.title: Estella Guitar Lessons: Play with the Best
passages.content:
Whether you play acoustic guitar electric, taking lessons with an Estella Guitar teacher is the
best way to improve your ability. [131] With years of experience crafting playing techniques, qualified instructors can tailor lessons to focus on the skills you want to fine-tune. [132] Receive a
customized learning plan to set goals and overcome the challenges that cause many players to
get discouraged.  An Estella Guitar teacher will help boost your confidence.

At Estella Guitar, we believe that playing music is a way of expressing yourself. we will help
you go beyond the familiar chords and riffs to develop your own identity as a musician. [133] Ready to
get started? [134] Visit www.estellaguitar.com/lessons to get matched with the right instructor for you!

options.label: A
options.text: Contact a technician for questions about repairs.

options.label: B
options.text: A high-quality instrument will help you to perform at your best.

options.label: C
options.text: The best resource for you as a learner is an expert to guide your progress.

options.label: D
options.text: It took them several years to master their instruments.

passages.content:
In-home delivery takes approximately one week after an order is shipped from our warehouse.
The actual time may vary based on the location of your and your availability for accepting the
item. [135] Vernico Furniture will work with a carrier an appointment that is convenient for you. [136] Typical hours are Monday through Friday between 8 A.M. and 5 р.м., evening appointments can often be arranged. [137] Upon arrival at your home, the item will be placed in the location you
desire.  Assembly is included as well.

options.label: A
options.text: When buying a home, location is extremely important.

options.label: B
options.text: Refinishing furniture is a form of art.

options.label: C
options.text: Furnished apartments can be found online.

options.label: D
options.text: All packing materials will be removed.

passages.title: Subject: Subscription
passages.content:
Dear Mr. Pham,
Your subscription to Medical Innovations Quarterly has been canceled.  May 1, you
will no longer receive the print edition. [139] [140]
We hope that you will consider once again becoming a of our publications. [141] Academe Media
publishes many high-quality scientific journals in addition to Medical Innovations Quarterly. Should
you wish to subscribe to one by May 31, we can offer you a two-year subscription at the annual
rate. Visit www.academemedia.com/shop and enter the code DOUBLE checkout. [142]
If you have any feedback that could help us improve our products or services, please call me
directly at 212-555-0122.

Sincerely,
Leena Montoya
Customer Service Manager, Academe Media

options.label: A
options.text: Thank you for your timely order.

options.label: D
options.text: Please contact us to update your information.

passages.content:
In a commercial kitchen, all refrigerators are required to have a thermometer that from
0°F (-18°C) to 220°F (104°C). [143] To prevent the growth of bacteria, refrigerated foods must be
stored at 41°F (5°C) or below. The head chef is responsible for checking these thermometers
throughout the day to ensure that the kitchen is in compliance at all times.
Also important to consider is Thermometers should always be located in the warmest
spot in the refrigerator. [144] [145] This location is also appropriate because it allows the
thermometer to be easily as soon as the door is opened. [146]

options.label: B
options.text: This is typically inside the door.

options.label: C
options.text: It should be kept cool at all times.

options.label: D
options.text: They can also be purchased in bulk.
